duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct healthcare fraud investigations, data mining, and analysis to prevent, detect, and deter fraudulent activities in the insurance programs.
Use data mining techniques and statistical analysis to identify potential fraud, waste, and abuse against all insurance programs.
Develop and implement corrective action plans based on investigative findings.
Prepare and present investigative findings and summary reports for referrals to law enforcement officials for prosecution.
Maintain chain of custody on all documents and evidence gathered during investigations.
Participate in annual seminars/webinars to stay updated on fraud trends and issues.
Maintain and manage case tracking systems, generate trend analysis reports, and provide support for investigative team.
Coordinate post-payment claims review by external vendors and perform quality audits on closed cases.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in business, healthcare administration, accounting, nursing, criminal justice or related field (Master's preferred)
Accredited Health Care Fraud Investigator (AHFI) certification
Certificates/designations and/or advanced training in healthcare fraud and abuse investigations
